document.full_text: newly appointed u.s. special envoy princeton lyman will depart on saturday for meetings in ethiopia and sudan on the transition of south sudan to independence in july, the state department said.
document.title: u.s. special envoy departs for meetings on sudan
lines_and_colors: newly appointed u.s. special envoy princeton lyman will depart on saturday for meetings in ethiopia and sudan on the transition of south sudan to independence in july, the state department said.
